content.text: What do you do for fun?
I spend a lot of time reading and cooking.
Oh I love to read too! I love learning about new things.
Me too! I love reading about history and science.
I like to build computers and rock climb!
I've never been rock climbing before! Is it fun?
It's so much fun! It's a great way to get exercise and it's really challenging.
I'm not very athletic, but I might try it sometime!
You should! It's a great way to push yourself.
I've been meaning to start eating healthier. What kind of foods do you like to cook?
I love to make pasta and pizza. I also like to bake bread.
I love pasta! I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
I have a really good recipe for pesto pasta. Do you want me to send it to you?
That would be great! Thank you!
